import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class ChooseCar extends Component { // set state for img due to img is change when click event occur state = { imgProduct: require('../Asset/products/black-car.jpg') } // Define event onClick renderCar = (imgNewProduct) => { // define new state let state = { imgProduct: imgNewProduct } // set new state this.setState(state) } render() { return (
Exterior
{this.renderCar(require('../Asset/products/black-car.jpg'))}}>

Crystal Black

Pearl

{this.renderCar(require('../Asset/products/red-car.jpg'))}}>

Crystal Red

Pearl

{this.renderCar(require('../Asset/products/silver-car.jpg'))}}>

Crystal Silver

Pearl

{this.renderCar(require('../Asset/products/steel-car.jpg'))}}>

) } }
